name: Endless Sea's
description:
BAKSTEEN STUDIO'S PRESENTS

Endless Sea's is an in-development RPG. Players create their own characters and roam the open sea's for adventures.

Features:

  • Huge world to explore
  • 1 Main Questline
  • Countless side-quests.
  • Various enemy types including bosses.
  • Tons of weapons
  • Tons of gear
  • Crafting system
  • Lockpicking system
  • Shops with a real economy(including fluctuating prices)

ENDLESS SEA'S IS AN EARLY ACCES GAME WHICH IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT. MANY FEATURES AREN'T IMPLEMENTED YET AND WON'T BE FOR QUITE A WHILE!

A real-time changelog can be found at: http://tinyurl.com/ESChangelog
